str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To favor specially, show partiality. From prosopoleptes; to favor an individual, i.e. Show partiality.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: (a) I reprove, rebuke, discipline, (b) I expose, show to be guilty. Of uncertain affinity; to confute, admonish.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a primary nemo; law, genitive case, specially, (including the volume); also of the Gospel), or figuratively.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A transgressor, law-breaker. From parabaino; a violator.
